channel.title: Silvia Tomanin
channel.description: Silvia Tomanin's website: web engineer + product manager.

item.title: Ipu Open Data
item.description:
Led the design and development of the IPU Open Data platform for housing, managing, visualizing and sharing IPU data on parliaments.

Product management, product ownership, data visualization, UX, usability tests.
IPU Open Data prototype (platform currently under development) / Drupal 7, data visualization, multilingual, responsive, REST APIs

item.title: Ipu Website Redesign
item.description:
Product management, information architecture design, UX, migration.
Visit the Inter-Parliamentary Union website / Drupal 7, multilingual, responsive, migration, Apache Solr, Redis

item.title: Doc On Demand Product Design
item.description: DocOnDemand, an app that will help you find the best doctors for your needs. Brainstorming, prototyping, design iterations, and evaluation. / Mobile, Balsamiq, InVision, UserTesting

item.title: Médecins Sans Frontières Cms Shared Platform
item.description:
Website redesigns, migration, technical management and customer support for the MSF CMS Shared Platform.

Visit http://www.doctorswithoutborders.org.

Drupal 7 multisite, multilingual, responsive, migration, SASS, Apache Solr, Varnish

item.title: Msf International Website
item.description: Website management, content publication and technical maintenance for the MSF International Website. / Drupal 7, Varnish, Apache Solr, responsive

item.title: Generations Plus Website
item.description: Website design, configuration and custom development for the Swiss magazine Générations Plus. Community and e-commerce features and external web services integration. / Drupal 7, e-commerce, SOAP web services

item.title: Cern Public Website Redesign
item.description: Site building, custom modules development, migration, maintenance for CERN core website and other satellite websites (ie. CERN Press, Entice project). / Drupal 7, SASS, LDAP, JSON, multilingual, responsive, migration
